name: Lucky Player
description:
◆◆◆Blackjack◆◆◆

Blackjack generally use 1-8 decks of cards. The calculation of poker points in your hand is: 2-9 cards, calculated according to their original points; K, Q, J and 10 cards are all counted as 10 points (usually denoted as T, which is The meaning of ten); A card (ace) can be counted as 1 point or 11 points, which is determined by the player (when the player is suspended, the points are always regarded as the largest and try not to burst, such as A+9 is 20, A+4+8 is 13, and A+3+A is regarded as 15).

◆◆◆Texas Hold'em◆◆◆

There are a total of 52 playing cards in Texas Hold'em, and there is no trump card. Each player is divided into two cards as "hole cards". At the beginning of the game, each player will be dealt two face down cards. After all the betting circles, if the winner still cannot be distinguished, the game will enter the "showdown" stage, that is, let the remaining players show their hole cards to a higher level, and the big card holder wins.

◆◆◆Sic Bo◆◆◆

Sic Bo is an ancient dice game in which players bet on the spin results of three dice spinning in a cage. You can bet on one or more numbers on the table at the same time. The game table is divided into several "zones" for betting, and each zone represents a different type of dice result or combination.
At the beginning of the game, place the chips anywhere on the table to represent one or more combinations of dice. After the bet is completed, the cage with the dice will start to spin, and the result will be displayed on the upper right of the screen.

◆◆◆Fishing◆◆◆

According to the advancement of the plot, players complete the tasks of each stage and cooperate with each other to successfully clear the customs. At the same time, in daily fishing, the fish are no longer just the target of being hunted, they will also take the initiative to attack the player, the more advanced the area, the stronger the attack of the fish! Players need to constantly improve themselves in order to explore more new seas.

◆◆◆Fruit machine◆◆◆

The fruit machine game interface consists of 24 squares spliced ​​into a square, each square has a target (fruit), and each square has a small light. After the player puts in the game currency, he chooses the target he wants to bet on. When the player presses the start button, the small light starts to rotate around each grid in the square. When the small light stops, if it stops on the target bet by the player , The player can win the corresponding game currency.
